methods.name: attachInterrupt()
methods.desc: Calls a function when the value of an input pin changes

methods.name: digitalRead()
methods.desc: Returns the value of an input pin

methods.name: digitalWrite()
methods.desc: Sets an output pin to be either high or low

methods.name: pinMode()
methods.desc: Configures a pin to act either as input or output

methods.name: releaseInterrupt()
methods.desc: Stops listening for interrupts on an input pin

methods.name: releasePin()
methods.desc: Gives ownership of a pin back to the operating system

methods.name: waitFor()
methods.desc: Waits for the value of an input pin to change

methods.name: waitFor()
methods.desc:
Waits for the value of an input pin to change

  This function will throw a RuntimeException in case of a timeout.
